EmailTemplate.subject: Get the Right Tools for Your Big Data Apps
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=There}},
In todayâ€™s business environment, companies are investing in strategic custom applications to enhance their competitive advantages. Big Data for these high-performing, scalable and reliable applications requires a new set of tools and technologies.
Pivotal GemFire and GemFire XD provide the right tools for the job. Join <http://www.pivotal.io/big-data/scale-out-your-big-data-apps> Pivotal experts on November 12 for a 30-minute webcast to learn more about how modern Big Data technology can enhance applications.
REGISTER NOW >> <http://www.pivotal.io/big-data/scale-out-your-big-data-apps> SCALE OUT YOUR BIG DATA WEDNESDAY NOVEMBER 12, 2014 10AM PST REGISTER <http://www.pivotal.io/big-data/scale-out-your-big-data-apps>
